channel.title: To treat animals on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in To treat animals on Game6r

item.title: Become An Animal Dentist
item.description: During the game Treat Animal Teeth you have to provide medical assistance to the cat Angela. Her teeth hurt, so quickly use the necessary dental tools to help out the unfortunate. Tips will help you navigate the treatment process, the screen will always display what needs to be applied at the moment.

item.title: Super Happy Kitty
item.description: After starting the Animal Doctor game, you will see the cat Angela, who was rollerblading and survived a dangerous fall. Kitty has received many injuries, serious and not so much, so it’s time to give her medical attention. In the game for girls, you will need to use the given tools correctly.
